feature.name: Platform Admin — Add Agent Abilities, Remove Old Simulator + Proactive V2 Demo
feature.description: Surface new agent pages (Agent Abilities, Agent Performance, Copilot Lab, Agent Teams, Enrichment Demo, Agent Research) on the platform dashboard. Remove deprecated Agent Simulator and Proactive V2 Demo — all old routes redirect to /platform/agent-abilities.

stories.title: Update platformSections config with new agent entries and remove old simulator
acceptance: agent-simulator entry removed from 'AI & Intelligence' section
3 new entries added to 'AI & Intelligence': Agent Abilities, Agent Performance, Copilot Lab
3 new entries added to 'Development Tools': Agent Teams, Enrichment Comparison, Agent Research Demo
All new entries have correct hrefs, icons, descriptions, and 'New' badges

stories.title: Redirect old routes (agent-simulator, proactive-simulator, proactive-v2-demo) and clean up imports
acceptance: ProactiveSimulator and ProactiveAgentV2Demo removed from lazyPages.tsx and App.tsx imports
stories.activeForm: Redirecting old routes and cleaning up imports

stories.title: Verify: build succeeds, no dangling imports
acceptance: vite build succeeds with zero errors (47.35s)
No dangling imports of ProactiveSimulator or ProactiveAgentV2Demo in App.tsx or lazyPages.tsx
All 6 new dashboard entries have valid route targets

execution.notes: Used 2-agent team (implementer + verifier) with Sonnet. Mid-flight plan update: user requested removing proactive-v2-demo too, all routes redirect to agent-abilities.
